physical_appearance:This is a photograph of Commercial Square in Singapore. The photograph shows a road
 with multi-storeyed buildings and shophouses on the right and trees on the left. There are vehicles along the road. There are a few people standing along the top balcony on the building on the right. The photograph is slightly faded around the edges. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.
